commentary.text: Gambhir and Kallis walk out to open
$$6pm$$ $$Kolkata$$ $$win$$ $$the$$ $$toss$$ $$and$$ $$will$$ $$bat$$
Might start gripping in the second innings, and we have got three quality spinners, says Gambhir. Feels that 140-150 will be a good total. "We are unchanged," captain adds.

Kevin Pietersen is getting better, says Dinesh Karthik, and adds that Delhi do not want to rush him. Delhi would have batted as well. Nathan Coulter-Nile and Jaydev Unadkat in for Wayne Parnell and Rahul Sharma

----- How many times has Australia been white-washed in an Ashes series? Which are the only Test playing countries against which Tendulkar didn't make 1000 Test runs? Which Australian cricketer was jokingly nick-named 'Oswald' because his name figured after Lee and Harvey in the batting line-up?
Think you have all the cricket answers? We have the questions. Have you tried your luck at   $$CricIQ$$ $$-$$ $$The$$ $$Greatest$$ $$Test$$ $$Ever$$ ?
Mohammed Shami to Kallis,1 wide,starts with a back of a length ball that slips down the leg side

Mohammed Shami to Kallis, $$OUT$$ ,terrific delivery, what a start for Delhi, Shami leaps as this one kicks from just back of a length around off, straightens on Kallis, he has to play at this, prods, and the thick edge flies low to Taylor at widish slip
Manish Pandey is the new man in, two slips in place
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,5 wides,but those two will only watch as Shami sprays this way down the leg side and even a dive from DK is futile
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,no run,and he reverts to the line just outside off, this one goes straightish, and Pandey comes out of his crease and lets it be
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,2 runs,nicely done, he walks out again, take this a bit high on the bat but goes through with the shot, timing it past point, third man is around, though
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,1 leg bye,this zooms in to the right-hander and nips him on the pad, but was going down easily, took him by surprise alright
Leg slip in
Mohammed Shami to Gambhir,no run,super, Gambhir beaten first up, this pitches short of a length around middle and leg and moves away as the batsman tentatively pushes at it
Mohammed Shami to Gambhir,1 wide,Shami alternating between rippers and wides, sends it down the left-hander's leg side now
Mohammed Shami to Gambhir,no run,the over ends finally, angles this across Gambhir on a good length, and the Kolkata captain lifts his bat to let it pass

Coulter-Nile to Pandey,no run,Coulter-Nile produces a beauty first up, bangs it in shortish, angles it in, then gets it to move away just outside off, Pandey is off balance, he is jumping, and even as he tries to leave it half-heartedly, it pings the bat, but falls short of Taylor at slip
Coulter-Nile to Pandey,1 run,this back of a length ball is angled in, tucking him up, he squeezes it to the on side and setts off, direct hit was needed
Coulter-Nile to Gambhir,no run,going across him, played out towards point

Coulter-Nile to Gambhir, $$OUT$$ ,and the plan has worked to perfection, successive ducks for Gautam Gambhir, he gets a back of a length ball down the pad, around hip height, tucks it fine instinctively, and there is a leg slip waiting to accept the gift
Coulter-Nile to Uthappa,no run,holds the line and zips through past the right-hander from a good length outside off, batsman pulls his bat inside the line late
Coulter-Nile to Uthappa,no run,beaten, as he follows this length ball which bounces and moves away sharply
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,no run,pitched up for the drive outside off, left alone
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,1 wide,thought about a pull as he saw it pitching short, but it swerved away too much and he let it go in the end
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,no run,now this one comes in a long way after pitching, thick inside edge on to pad flap as Pandey hops again

Mohammed Shami to Pandey,no run,Pandey is looking clueless at the moment against this quick burst from Delhi, another one comes in, cramps him for room and he does not help himself by hopping and getting into a tangle
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,1 wide,dug in short and wide outside off, he looks to hit it but pulls out in the end
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,2 runs,nice, this one is pitched full just outside off, and Pandey, to his credit, does not go hard at it in desperation, he eases it into the gap at extra cover
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,1 run,short and wide, he mishits the cut down to third man
Mohammed Shami to Uthappa,no run,he walks across the stumps, but Shami gets one more to nip in and hurry on into the pads, too high, though
Coulter-Nile to Pandey,no run
Coulter-Nile to Pandey,no run,143.3 kph length ball just outside off, and Pandey plays a nothing shot, opening the face and ultimately pushing well inside the line
Coulter-Nile to Pandey,no run,too good for him again as he fails to get bat on this away going length ball
Coulter-Nile to Pandey,no run,beaten on the pull now, it is a slower bouncer at 122 kph, and Pandey plays too early
Three slips in, two close by, third a touch wider
Coulter-Nile to Pandey,1 run,pushed away on the off side
Coulter-Nile to Uthappa,1 run,keeps strike with a pushed single towards mid off
Mohammed Shami to Uthappa,1 run,moves across to this length ball outside off and square drives towards third man
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,1 run,back of a length, coming in with the angle, worked to midwicket who makes a sliding stop to keep them to one
Mohammed Shami to Uthappa,1 run,softly drops a back of a length ball close to the crease and goes through for a comfortable single

Mohammed Shami to Pandey, $$FOUR$$ ,Pandey connects for some returns finally, Shami digs in the short offcutter, and Pandey is waiting to pull it hard to the deep midwicket rope, first boundary of the innings
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,2 runs,shortish from Shami, and Pandey is ready to try another pull, does not get hold of it this time but will pick up two through midwicket
Mohammed Shami to Pandey,no run,short once more, but this one is also angled, and Pandey is cramped for room this time, plays it back
Unadkat to Uthappa,1 run,Unadkat starts with a 126 kph short ball on the pads, and is fortunate the batsman mishits it, couple of bounces, to deep square leg
Unadkat to Pandey,1 run,ending inches outside off stump after being pushed across on a length, he adjusts to guide it to third man
Unadkat to Uthappa,1 run,pushes on the off side and runs, had JP D picked up this one cleanly at cover, they were struggling to avoid the run out, what with hesitation in going for the run
Unadkat to Pandey,no run,not happening for Pandey at the moment, he tries to make some room and manufacture a cut, but is beaten by some extra bounce
Unadkat to Pandey,no run,pushed to mid off
Unadkat to Pandey,1 run,turns it towards midwicket for a single
Neesham to Pandey,1 wide,Neesham starts with one so wide it was wide in any format you can think of
Neesham to Pandey, $$FOUR$$ ,short again, but in Pandey's range this time, and he slams a pull in the air, to the deep midwicket boundary
Neesham to Pandey,no run,flying stop by Manoj Tiwary at point, as Pandey guides this slowish length ball to his right
Neesham to Pandey,1 run,comes down the track, but is cramped for room by a shortish one, knocks it past the non-striker for one
Neesham to Uthappa,1 run,opens the face and guides a back of a length ball to third man
Neesham to Pandey, $$FOUR$$ ,this has been cracked through extra cover, Pandey walks across to a full and wide one, and clobbers it
Neesham to Pandey,1 wide,walks across again and Neesham cracks now by sending it down the leg side
Neesham to Pandey,1 run,better from Neesham to end, with a good length ball outside off, that is pushed to mid off for one
Unadkat to Pandey,1 run,comes down the crease, Unadkat slows it down, at 114 kph, and batsman stops and adjusts to knock it to the off side
Unadkat to Uthappa,1 run,comes forward and opens the face to pick up an easy single to cover-point region
Unadkat to Pandey,1 run,keeps walking out, this one is short now, and he turns it wristily to deep midwicket

Unadkat to Uthappa,1 run, $$dropped$$ , Uthappa checks a pull and hits it high to Taylor at short midwicket, he gets both hands to the ball as it comes over his head, parries it over, but falls to the ground and even as he stretches, the ball falls well out of his reach
Unadkat to Pandey,1 run,much more intent on this pull from Pandey, straight to deep midwicket though
Unadkat to Uthappa,1 run,turns a good length ball off the pad to the leg side for one
Time-out time it is
Nadeem to bowl left arm spin
Nadeem to Uthappa,2 runs,bowled in to the pad with the angle, he walks across, goes back and punches it through midwicket for two
Nadeem to Uthappa,1 run,flatter one pitched shortish and comes in to the right-hander, is punched to the sweeper
Nadeem to Pandey,1 run,tosses it up a tad, he comes down the track, but is not to the pitch and pushes it past the non-striker softly
Nadeem to Uthappa,1 run,shortish and angled in, worked in front of square on leg
Nadeem to Pandey,1 run,another one pushed into middle and leg, and turned to deep midwicket

Nadeem to Uthappa,no run,now he bowls a conventional left-armer's away spinning ball, it is defended towards cover, non-striker wants non-existent singles, but escapes as the throw is weak, and bowler is standing too far behind the stumps expecting a stronger one
Unadkat to Pandey,2 runs,moves across outside off and tries to slog it, but it is too full, and he mishits it to deep midwicket, had Neesham's throw hit, Uthappa was gone by miles
Unadkat to Pandey,1 run
Unadkat to Uthappa,no run,dances down and goes through with an elegant attempted loft down the ground, but misses the ball
Unadkat to Uthappa,1 run,worked off the pad to the leg side for a single
Unadkat to Pandey,2 runs,goes hard at a full delivery but it does not have enough in it to split long on and long off
Unadkat to Pandey,1 run,a slower one to end the over and Pandey has to check his shot to extra cover as he charges out

Karan: "I think Pandey should open the batting for KKR. It will lift some pressure off Gambhir and since Pandey is in some sort of form, it will give Gambhir a chance to come in when the score is in their favour. "
Nadeem to Pandey,2 runs,Pandey moves a tad towards the leg side and crashes this pitched up ball through extra cover, long off gets to it
Nadeem to Pandey,1 run,down the track to nudge it through midwicket
Nadeem to Uthappa,1 run,that turned quite a bit, it was angled sharply into the pad initially and straightened on Uthappa, who defended and accepted the single as it rolled square on the off side
Nadeem to Pandey, $$FOUR$$ ,sees him coming out, pushes it quick into the pad, Pandey swings in front of square and beats the man in the deep
Nadeem to Pandey, $$FOUR$$ ,much cleaner this time, Nadeem continues to push it towards leg stump, and Pandey carts it in front of square leg once more

Nadeem to Pandey, $$OUT$$ ,got him this time, slows it down a bit, gives it some air, the line is around off, Pandey is confused immediately, pushes weakly for some turn, there isn't any, and the stumps are rattled
Duminy to Uthappa,no run,pushes forward for some turn from the offspinner, but there is not much, and it is a bit of a leading edge down the track
Duminy to Uthappa,1 run,punched off the back foot on the off side
Duminy to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,turned off the pad behind square leg
Duminy to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,neat, Uthappa reverse sweeps a tossed up ball from around off, and beats short third man with a crisp connection
Duminy to Uthappa,1 run,punched through midwicket
Duminy to Shakib Al Hasan,no run,tossed up slower, he comes forward and runs it to point, not getting anything for that

Nadeem to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,oh dear me, meltdowns galore, Uthappa wants a single after pushing to the leg side, non-striker is not interested, Uthappa is half way down when he turns, he should have no chance, but he will instead get bonus runs, as Nadeem's throw is nowhere near the keeper, forget the stumps
Nadeem to Uthappa,no run
Nadeem to Uthappa,1 run,stayed a bit low this time, as Uthappa went back to punch it, squirts it behind square leg
Nadeem to Shakib Al Hasan, $$SIX$$ ,Shakib down the track, gets under the ball and wallops it high over deep midwicket
Nadeem to Shakib Al Hasan,no run,comes out again, Nadeem pings it full into the pad, Shakib adjusts to nudge it square
Nadeem to Shakib Al Hasan,no run,bowls it flat around off, Shakib tries to dab it away, but cannot get much purchase on it
Raja: "Too many runout chances, I forgot count now."
Duminy to Uthappa,no run,makes room outside leg, this one is on middle and staying a bit low, he toe-ends it to the bowler
Duminy to Uthappa,1 run,he's charged out but mishit this lofted stroke, Agarwal comes forward at long on, he dives in front, but it bounces ahead of him, nice effort
Duminy to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run
Duminy to Uthappa,1 run,full one crashed down straight to long off
Duminy to Shakib Al Hasan,2 runs,Shakib leaves the crease again, and goes inside out over extra cover, Agarwal in business again with a run from long off, dives and parries it away from the rope
Duminy to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,nudged square on the leg side
Pravek Sharma: "Wayward throwing can hurt Delhi big time here."
Neesham to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,charges out to a slow and wide one, edges it high in the air, it rolls down to third man
Neesham to Uthappa, $$SIX$$ ,lashed over wide long off, Uthappa gets a length ball, steps forward, bends a knee and hammers it high
Neesham to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,Uthappa in flow, on the leg side now, this is shortish, Uthappa swings it off the front foot and times it to the deep square leg rope
Neesham to Uthappa,1 run,full delivery now eased down the ground
Neesham to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,full toss on middle, Shakib turns it straight to square leg, there is a direct hit here, but Shakib has made it back in time, he was slow in turning around
Neesham to Uthappa,no run,walks far across but fails to get bat on this delivery that goes past leg stump
agan: "Yusuf should be given chance higher in the order. He should not be treated just as hitter."
Duminy to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,well adjusted, he did not have the length or the angle to swing leg side, so he waits and chips it over the bowler
Duminy to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,down the pads, swept hard, and well wide of short fine leg
Duminy to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,Uthappa running away now, he's swung another boundary to deep square leg, reached forward and mowed it in the air
Duminy to Uthappa,1 run,around the blockhole and squeezed out to the off side
Duminy to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,full on middle and leg, he squeezes it out to the sweeper
Duminy to Uthappa,1 run,skips out, takes it on the full, and finds long off
and we have another time out
Unadkat to Uthappa,1 run,pushes a length ball to the off side and gets the single that takes him to 50
Unadkat to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,makes some room but cannot get much power on the loft through the off side as he falls away a tad
Unadkat to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,neatly done, very full outside off, not too much width, but Uthappa opens the face and times it to deep backward point rope
Unadkat to Uthappa,1 run,comes down the track and hits it hard on the bounce to long off
Unadkat to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,cannot get under this full delivery and squeezes it out to the off side instead
Unadkat to Uthappa, $$OUT$$ ,Uthappa finds deep midwicket this time, it was shortish, angled in, right in the pulling zone, he swung it from outside the crease, and into the safe hands of Ross Taylor
Yusuf Pathan is in
Coulter-Nile to Pathan, $$FOUR$$ ,and finds the boundary first ball, whips a full ball angled in, beats midwicket's jump, and also JP D's sliding attempt in the deep
Coulter-Nile to Pathan,1 run,moves across, it is full around off, and he can only hit it along the ground to long on
Coulter-Nile to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,short and climbing on Shakib, who awkwardly pulls it down to fine leg
Coulter-Nile to Pathan,1 run,top edges a 141 kph short ball, and it falls quite short of the man running in from deep midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Shakib Al Hasan, $$FOUR$$ ,poor line to the left-hander, good length down the pads, and Shakib swipes it to the deep backward square boundary
Coulter-Nile to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,has a heave at a pitched up ball, which travels high and falls at vacant mid on
Mohammed Shami to Shakib Al Hasan, $$FOUR$$ ,Shakib's tried the lap and pulled it off, he's walked outside off, the length ball arrives there, and he turns it very fine down the leg side
Mohammed Shami to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,cracks a full ball straight down the ground, long on slides and saves it, but they have taken only one
Mohammed Shami to Pathan,2 runs,cannot get under this full ball around off, but they will benefit from the mistiming to steal two at vacant midwicket
Mohammed Shami to Pathan,1 run,a slower length ball turned in front of square leg
Mohammed Shami to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,138.8 kph full delivery on middle and leg swung along the ground to wide long on
Mohammed Shami to Pathan,1 run,in the blockhole, dug out into the pitch and over the bowler, Shakib is running back for the second, but Yusuf sends him back, no way Yusuf was making it back in time

Coulter-Nile to Pathan,1 wide,it is called a wide, Yusuf has almost been hit by this short ball down leg, it has gone over his shoulder as he misses, Coulter Nile asks it it was called for height, DK can't believe it
Coulter-Nile to Pathan,1 run,full toss hit to long on
Coulter-Nile to Shakib Al Hasan,no run,top stuff from the bowler, first he pings it into the blockhole, Shakib knocks it to his left, and Coulter Nile goes flying like a goalkeeper to pouch it
Coulter-Nile to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,and one more in the blockhole, terrific execution from Couter Nile, Shakib can only squeeze it to the off side
Coulter-Nile to Pathan, $$OUT$$ ,Coulter Nile keeps bowling yorkers, this is outside off now, Yusuf gets down on his knee and swings, and inside-edges it into his stumps
Coulter-Nile to Yadav,no run,he tries some kind of a reverse scoop, but this is shortish and bounces past

Coulter-Nile to Yadav,(no ball)  $$FOUR$$ ,that extra ball because of that wide might still cost them, this is a very high full toss, and Yadav has sent it screaming over short third man with a neat reverse paddle even as he swivels away to avoid getting hit

Coulter-Nile to Yadav, $$FOUR$$ ,one more extra delivery, and this goes for four too, Yadav bends, and reverses the full toss over short third man once more, seems to play this shot remarkably well, keeps eyes on the ball and twists his wrists very late

Shakib says they were looking at around 135-140. They have got plenty more than that. Pandey struggled but hung on to make a decent score, Uthappa and Shakib gave the innings impetus and Yadav spoiled what had been a tight last over

name: Kolkata Knight Riders v Delhi Daredevils
